companyWord.quote: Virtual© — creative agency that creating content design. We have knowledge and provide landscape photography services for our advanced clients.

desc: We provide professional photo and video creation services during drone flights. We have the necessary equipment and skills to carry out the most advanced projects that are used in internet marketing. We have been operating in the industry for 8 years and during this time we have created many projects for our clients.
We also conduct training and support young people to expand their knowledge in the field of aviation

desc: If you need interesting shots that you can use in your advertising campaigns and surprise your recipients, send us a message. We will reply to the message and present our price list and conditions for taking the shooting.
From time to time, we organize public trainings that you can sign up for. Such information can be obtained by browsing our website. Stay on top of the website and follow our social profiles.
